input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Fette Filter - Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter Compatible for Kenmore. (2-Pack)

Item specifications:
Easy to intsall. Replace every 6 months
15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders
Less costly than the OEM without compromising quality.
Compatible with Kenmore Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter
High Quality Fette Filter Brand Product
Carbon-based, long-lasting charcoal filter
Replace every 6 months
Packaging may vary


Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Enjoy fresh, clean air in your home with Fette Filter's Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter, compatible with Kenmore. This high-quality carbon-based filter is 15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing odors, ensuring your fridge stays fresh and odor-free. Each filter lasts up to 6 months, making it a cost-effective way to keep your fridge in top condition. With easy installation and a long-lasting charcoal filter, this product is the perfect choice for anyone looking to improve the air quality in their home.

Packaging may vary.
input_text.Response B: Fette Filter Elite 469918 Refrigerator Air Filter is compatible with Kenmore. It is a high-quality product that is less costly than OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and is 15 times more effective than baking soda in reducing orders. The long-lasting carbon-based charcoal filter helps to reduce odors. It is easy to install and should be replaced every 6 months. The packaging may vary.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.feedback: A gives more information and makes it sound like it is something you need
